  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105839</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Waste Not, Want Not - Preparing Public Information Campaigns in Support of Water Conservation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergeudung nicht, wünschen - allgemeine 
Informationen Kampagnen nicht vorbereiten zur Unterstützung der 
Wasser-Erhaltung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La perte pas, veulent pas - préparer des 
campagnes publiques de l'information à l'appui de l'économie de 
l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desperdício não, quer não - preparar 
campanhas públicas da informação na sustentação do conservation 
da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spreco non, desidera non - la preparazione 
delle campagne pubbliche delle informazioni a sostegno di 
conservazione dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα απόβλητα όχι, θέλουν όχι - προετοιμάζοντας τις 
δημόσιες εκστρατείες πληροφόρησης υπέρ της συντήρησης ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La basura no, desea no - la preparación de 
campañas públicas de la información en la ayuda de la conservación
del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students share opinions about the causes and effects of droughts. They then investigate and prepare public information campaigns supporting water conservation in their community.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion teilen Kursteilnehmer Meinungen 
über die Ursachen und die Effekte von Dürren. Sie dann 
forschen nach und bereiten die allgemeinen Informationen Kampagnen 
vor, die Wassererhaltung in ihrer Gemeinschaft unterstützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants partagent des 
avis au sujet des causes et des effets des sécheresses. Ils 
alors étudient et préparent des campagnes publiques de l'information
supportant l'économie de l'eau dans leur communauté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes compartilham de 
opiniões sobre as causas e os efeitos das secas. Então 
investigam e preparam as campanhas públicas da informação que 
suportam o conservation da água em sua comunidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi ripartiscono le 
opinioni circa le cause e gli effetti delle siccità. Allora 
studiano e preparano le campagne pubbliche delle informazioni che 
sostengono la conservazione dell'acqua nella loro Comunità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές συμμερίζονται τις 
απόψεις για τα αίτια και τα αιτιατά των ξηρασιών. Ερευνούν 
έπειτα και προετοιμάζουν τις δημόσιες εκστρατείες πληροφόρησης 
που υποστηρίζουν τη συντήρηση ύδατος στην κοινότητά τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes comparten 
opiniones sobre las causas y los efectos de sequías. Después 
investigan y preparan las campañas públicas de la información que 
utilizan la conservación del agua en su comunidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
